title: 107_hr4893
content: Pennsylvania National Forest Improvement Act of 2002 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) sell or exchange specified National Forest System lands and administrative sites in Pennsylvania. (2) convey the Sheffield Ranger District Headquarters to the Warren County Development Association, Warren County, Pennsylvania. And (3) convey the Marienville ranger residence to the Marienville Volunteer Fire Department, Forest County, Pennsylvania.
